article_title: WATCH LIVE: John Boehner Holds Press Conference on Resignation
article_text:
House Speaker John Boehner will hold a press conference at 1 p.m. ET on Friday to discuss his sudden resignation from his speakership and his seat in the U.S. House of Representatives.

Watch the video below, via NBC News:

[Image via screengrab]

— —
